ing: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
des: "A simple and wonderfully balanced BBQ sauce that tastes equally amazing on pork, beef, or chicken."
ins: In a saucepan over medium heat, mix the tomato sauce, honey, soy sauce, vinegar, corn syrup, Worcestershire sauce, hoisin sauce, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper. Cook 30 minutes, until thickened. Cool, and use immediately.
